title: December 8: NOAA, partners to announce findings from 2020 Arctic Report Card
content:
NOAA and its partners will release the 15th Arctic Report Card, with the latest scientific observations of climate change in the Arctic, a sensitive part of the world that impacts other parts of the planet, at a virtual news conference on Tue., Dec. 8, at 11:00 a.m. ET, during the American Geophysical Unionâ€™s fall meeting.
Click to read the full article
